text: Mpe ye nde azali kotinda mopepe na sango elamu eye ezali epai naye kino mopepe ekomi londende ya kilo, tozali kosopa yango na mboka eye ekawuka (makufa) mpe tozali kokitisela yango mayi mpe tozali kobimisa na yango bambuma ya lolenge inso. Ndenge wana nde tokobimisaka bawei, mpo bokoka kokanisa
